formattedAddress: 454 E 84th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 454 E 84th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: The service itself is not good. I used it for months and I received clothes back dyed and dirty, covered in stains and filth. I paid extra to have the colors seperated and confirmed on text, and the clothes still came back discolored even though I paid for the separation on multiple occasions. The owner is one of the rudest, meanest men you’ll ever have the disservice of speaking to. The customer service is horrible. You cannot do pick up past 930am and you cannot do pick ups on Friday and they only tell you that after you pay the monthly fee. There are much better services than Capri. An overall awful experience.

originalText.text:
I absolutely love Capri Laundry Room. I’ve been working with them for a few months now, and they have been super communicative, responsive, and even fair. When I missed a week and without even asking, they deducted a week from the subscription rate. But I think what just took the cake for me was I left a pair of AirPods in my joggers, and I was totally devastated. But I gave them a description of the pants and they pulled them out and left them in a little baggie for me. That just made all the difference, lol.

I highly recommend them and I’m supporting I’m this awesome business.

originalText.text: A welcome addition to the neighborhood. Building on the success of their other location, this tailor, launderer and dry cleaner provides excellent service in a clean, updated, zen-like atmosphere. The tailoring I had done was fast, competitively priced and well done. Our dry cleaning and laundry came out great and was delivered back to our front door quickly.  Overall excellent staff, service and storefront. Highly recommended.

originalText.text: Fast and delightful service. You get to choose your detergent and they text for pick up / drop off. My clothes were still warm from the dryer when I received them this evening. Will definitely use again in the future!

text.text: Fast and delightful service. You get to choose your detergent and they text for pick up / drop off. My clothes were still warm from the dryer when I received them this evening. Will definitely use again in the future!

originalText.text: Great place! They are quick and super friendly! They allow you to pick your preferred detergent (in case of sensitive skin). The staff is charming and my clothes always come back folded nicely and very clean. They are always willing to follow specific instructions (air dry, or low tumble dry) for certain items that need to be washed differently! Highly recommend!
